00026 #include <thrust/iterator/iterator_categories.h>

00031 namespace thrust
00032 {
00033 
00040 // forward declarations
00041 template<typename T> struct device_reference;
00042 
00061 template<typename T> struct device_ptr
00062 {
00063   // define iterator_traits types
00064   typedef thrust::random_access_device_iterator_tag iterator_category;
00065   typedef T                                          value_type;
00066   typedef ptrdiff_t                                  difference_type;
00067   typedef device_ptr                                 pointer;
00068   typedef device_reference<T>                        reference;
00069 
00072   __host__ __device__
00073   device_ptr(void) : mPtr(0) {}
00074 
00081   template<class Y>
00082   __host__ __device__
00083   explicit device_ptr(Y * ptr) : mPtr(ptr) {}
00084 
00088   __host__ __device__
00089   device_ptr(const device_ptr<typename detail::remove_const<value_type>::type> &ptr) : mPtr(ptr.get()) {}
00090 
00097   template<typename U>
00098   __host__ __device__
00099   operator device_ptr<U> (void) const
00100     {return device_ptr<U>(static_cast<U*>(get()));}
00101 
00108   __host__ __device__
00109   device_ptr operator+(const difference_type &rhs) const {return device_ptr(mPtr + rhs);}
00110 
00117   __host__ __device__
00118   device_ptr operator-(const difference_type &rhs) const {return device_ptr(mPtr - rhs);}
00119 
00124   __host__ __device__
00125   device_ptr &operator++(void) {++mPtr; return *this;}
00126 
00131   __host__ __device__
00132   device_ptr operator++(int)
00133   {
00134     device_ptr copy(*this);
00135     ++(*this);
00136     return copy;
00137   } // end operator++()
00138 
00143   __host__ __device__
00144   device_ptr &operator--(void) {--mPtr; return *this;}
00145 
00150   __host__ __device__
00151   device_ptr operator--(int)
00152   {
00153     device_ptr copy(*this);
00154     --(*this);
00155     return copy;
00156   } // end operator--()
00157 
00164   __host__ __device__
00165   device_ptr &operator+=(difference_type rhs) {mPtr += rhs; return *this;}
00166 
00173   __host__ __device__
00174   device_ptr &operator-=(difference_type rhs) {mPtr -= rhs; return *this;}
00175 
00183   __host__ __device__
00184   difference_type operator-(const device_ptr &rhs) const {return mPtr - rhs.mPtr;}
00185 
00191   __host__ __device__
00192   reference operator[](const difference_type &i) const;
00193 
00197   __host__ __device__
00198   reference operator*(void) const;
00199 
00203   __host__ __device__
00204   value_type *get(void) const {return mPtr;}
00205 
00206   private:
00207     value_type *mPtr;
00208 
00209     typedef value_type *                               device_dereferenceable_type;
00210 
00211     // befriend device_dereferenceable_iterator_traits so he can get at device_derereferenceable_type
00212     friend struct thrust::detail::device_dereferenceable_iterator_traits< thrust::device_ptr<T> >;
00213 
00214     // create an object type similar to device_ptr which can be dereferenced from a __global__
00215     // or __device__ function
00216     device_dereferenceable_type device_dereferenceable(void) {return get();}
00217 
00218     // befriend make_device_dereferenceable so he can get at device_dereferenceable()
00219     friend struct thrust::detail::make_device_dereferenceable< thrust::device_ptr<T> >;
00220 }; // end device_ptr
